name: Just fishing (itch) (whatthesamuel)
description:
No competition, no pressure. Just relax and enjoy fishing on this lonely island!

This was a submission to the 39th GM48 game jam! Didn't get the best results, but I liked the results, and might revisit it again later!

  • Known bugs

Sometimes the sequence acts a bit weird, and is a bit jittery. I couldn't figure out how to fix it before deadline. I hope it isn't too distracting, will fix it after the jam.
